Track.Description: Parameters related to what the "Track" button in the user interface does.

NFramesSmall.Description: When the track button is pushed, one option is to track every Nth frame. Specify the smaller choice for N here.

NFramesLarge.Description: When the track button is pushed, one option is to track every Nth frame. Specify the larger choice for N here.

NFramesNeighborhood.Description: When the track button is pushed, one option is to track frames within a radius of the currently selected frame. Set the radius in frames here.

ChunkSize.Description: Track large movies in chunks of this size (in frames).
